# The `Instruction` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/user">sandboxir::User</a> with operands, opcode and linked with previous/next instructions in an instruction list. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::sandboxir::Instruction</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/user">sandboxir::User</a> with operands, opcode and linked with previous/next instructions in an instruction list.
